info.name: Media Services v3 LVA private preview (2019-09-01-preview)
info.description: Azure Media Services v3 API Collection. Includes Media Graph for Live Video Analytics Private Preview Last Modified Date: 10/10/19

item.name: Step 1:  Get AAD Auth Token
Get Azure AD Token for Service Principal Authentication

urlencoded.description: This is always set to client_credentials
The Client ID for your AAD application
The Client Secret (key) for your AAD application Service principal. This is URL Encoded on the wire.

Normally this is https://management.core.windows.net/ 
It can vary based on the specific Azure Cloud you are using. 
For Gov Cloud, China, Germany or other soverign cloud, please check the appropriate Azure management API endpoint URL settings in the documentation.

item.description: To get started making calls to Azure Media Services you have to first get an AAD auth JWT token

item.name: Operations

request.description: Lists all the Media Services operations.

item.description: Required for all Azure Resource Management providers.  The List operation returns back all available operations.

request.description: Creates or updates a Media Services account
Updates an existing Media Services account
Deletes a Media Services account
Synchronizes storage account keys for a storage account associated with the Media Service account.
Checks whether the Media Service resource name is available.

List Assets in the Media Services account with optional filtering and ordering
List Assets in the Media Services account with optional filtering and ordering
List Assets in the Media Services account with optional filtering and ordering

Creates or updates an Asset in the Media Services account

Set the alternateId to a value for tracking in external systems

Set the storageAccountName to any storage account registered with the Media Services account if you want to target the asset creation to a specific storage account. Container names are generated automatically if not provided

containerName - Provide a custom container name on creation
Updates an existing Asset in the Media Services account
Deletes an Asset in the Media Services account
Lists storage container URLs with shared access signatures (SAS) for uploading and downloading Asset content. The signatures are derived from the storage account keys.
Gets the Asset storage encryption keys used to decrypt content created by version 2 of the Media Services API
Lists Streaming Locators which are associated with this asset.
List Asset Filters associated with the specified Asset.
Get the details of an Asset Filter associated with the specified Asset.

item.description:
This is the new Live Video Analytics MediaGraph APIS for ingesting from an RTSP IP Camera (AXIS for example).
This featuer is in private preview currently
